languages.text: {n}Таланты Леди Моллес-Секандас очевидны — она без труда поднимет производство на любой планете. Некоторое "повышение", маскированное под наказание, позволит извлечь существенную выгоду — у вас как раз на примете есть захолустные миры с хорошим потенциалом, но без достойного управителя.{/n}

{n}Lady Molles-Secundas's talents are self-evident — she could easily boost production on any planet. What might be called her promotion under the guise of punishment would bring tangible benefits. You just so happen to think of several backwater worlds that have good potential but lack the capable stewardship to match it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Таланты Леди Моллес-Секандас очевидны — она без труда поднимет производство на любой планете. languages.text: {n}Die Talente von Lady Molles-Secundas sind offensichtlich ... sie könnte die Produktion jedes Planeten steigern. Ihre Beförderung unter dem Deckmantel einer Bestrafung wäre mit einigen Vorteilen verbunden. Dir fallen spontan einige abgelegene Welten ein, die großes Potenzial, aber keinen kompetenten Verwalter haben.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Talente von Lady Molles-Secundas sind offensichtlich ... sie könnte die Produktion jedes Planeten steigern. Ihre Beförderung unter dem Deckmantel einer Bestrafung wäre mit einigen Vorteilen verbunden. Dir fallen spontan einige abgelegene Welten ein, die großes Potenzial, aber keinen kompetenten Verwalter haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les talents de dame Molles-Secundas parlent pour elle, elle serait largement capable d'accroître la productivité de n'importe quelle planète. Une promotion sous couvert de châtiment vous apporterait des avantages considérables. D'ailleurs, vous songez déjà à plusieurs mondes reculés dont le potentiel indéniable pourrait être pleinement exploité si vous en confiiez les rênes à une administratrice aussi efficace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lady Molles-Secundas's talents are self-evident — she could easily boost production on any planet. D'ailleurs, vous songez déjà à plusieurs mondes reculés dont le potentiel indéniable pourrait être pleinement exploité si vous en confiiez les rênes à une administratrice aussi efficace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人的才干不言而喻，她可以游刃有余地提高任何行星的资源产量。你可以打着惩罚的幌子，实际上对她进行提拔，这会为王朝带来切实可见的好处。你恰巧想起了几个发展落后的世界，这些世界拥有出色的潜力，但却缺乏能力出众的管理人员。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lady Molles-Secundas's talents are self-evident — she could easily boost production on any planet. What might be called her promotion under the guise of punishment would bring tangible benefits. You just so happen to think of several backwater worlds that have good potential but lack the capable stewardship to match it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人的才干不言而喻，她可以游刃有余地提高任何行星的资源产量。你可以打着惩罚的幌子，实际上对她进行提拔，这会为王朝带来切实可见的好处。你恰巧想起了几个发展落后的世界，这些世界拥有出色的潜力，但却缺乏能力出众的管理人员。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los talentos de lady Molles-Secundas son evidentes: podría mejorar la producción de cualquiera de tus planetas. Aunque se podría considerar un ascenso disfrazado de castigo, tendría unos beneficios innegables. Y se te ocurren varios planetas apartados con potencial y necesitados de una administración capaz de aprovecharlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lady Molles-Secundas's talents are self-evident — she could easily boost production on any planet. What might be called her promotion under the guise of punishment would bring tangible benefits. You just so happen to think of several backwater worlds that have good potential but lack the capable stewardship to match it.{/n}

Y se te ocurren varios planetas apartados con potencial y necesitados de una administración capaz de aprovecharlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レディ・モレス・セクンダスの才覚は明らかだ。彼女ならどの惑星の生産性も簡単に向上させられるだろう。処罰の名目でありながら、実際には彼女の昇進とも言える措置は、具体的な利益をもたらすことになる。ちょうどあなたの頭に、潜在能力は高いものの、有能な統治者を欠いている辺境の惑星がいくつか思い浮かんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lady Molles-Secundas's talents are self-evident — she could easily boost production on any planet. What might be called her promotion under the guise of punishment would bring tangible benefits. You just so happen to think of several backwater worlds that have good potential but lack the capable stewardship to match it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın becerileri gün gibi ortada. İstediği gezegendeki üretimi kolayca canlandırabilir. Ceza kisvesi altında yapılacak bir terfinin ileride büyük faydası dokunabilir. İyi potansiyele sahip ancak bu potansiyeli değerlendirecek hünerli bir idareciden yoksun birkaç ücra dünya aklına geliyor.{/n}
